subtitles.transcript: The culture of being public and the sense of obligation that comes from the establishment of
the University of California as a public trust is something that is so deep that, you know,
it was able to survive going from 70 percent to 50 percent to 33 percent to 12 percent state funding without a break in the narrative
and if that’s the case, the narrative can continue, even if it were 0 percent funding.
